thread.title: Advent introduces its Echobudz range of earphones in India | Deccan Chronicle
thread.title_full: Advent introduces its Echobudz range of earphones in India | Deccan Chronicle

author: Deccan
title: Advent introduces its Echobudz range of earphones in India | Deccan Chronicle
text:
Deccan Chronicle | October 10, 2015, 11.05 am Advent, the flagship brand of Adit Infratel Pvt Ltd and a leading player in the mobile accessories and peripherals market, has launched its new range of earphonesâ€”the Echobudz. Featuring enhanced bass effect, the Advent Echobudz earphones deliver crisp sound quality at an affordable price.
Available in four vibrant colour variants, i.e Echobudz AD-210MSBL in Blue, AD-EP200MSB in Black and AD-210MGR in Green and AD-EP200PRB in Red, the latest range of earphones come with a flat cable and are designed to cater to the needs of different users. While three colour variants (AD-210MSBL, AD-EP200MSB and AD-210MGR) are with mic function for users who would want to effortlessly switch between calls and music while on the go, two variants (AD-210MSBL and AD-EP200MSB) sport the switcher function to switch between different mobile operating systems. The no frills basic model (AD-EP200PRB) is geared towards music buffs who love crisp audio quality. Compatible with any device with a 3.5mm output, each Advent Echobudz pack come with two extra soft rubber earbuds.
The Echobudz range is priced affordably at Rs 299 for AD-210MSBL and AD-EP200MSB, Rs 239 for AD-210MGR and Rs 179 for AD-EP200PRB. The product comes with a warranty of six months and will be available at all leading retail outlets of all formats. It is also available on all leading e-commerce sites including Flipkart, Snapdeal, Amazon, Paytm, E-bay and Shopclues.com among others.
